Create a File Upload Zone

file_upload_zone.Rd

Creates a standardized file upload area with info text and proper styling using semantic CSS classes.

Usage

file_upload_zone(
  ns,
  id,
  label = NULL,
  accept = NULL,
  info_text = NULL,
  placeholder = NULL
)

Arguments

ns

Namespace function from the calling module

id

Input ID for file input

label

File input label (optional, set to NULL for no label)

accept

File types to accept

info_text

Informational text about file format

placeholder

Placeholder text for file input

Value

A div with file upload structure

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
file_upload_zone(ns, "pilot_data", 
  accept = c(".rds", ".RDS"),
  info_text = "Combined RDS file with baseline expression",
  placeholder = "Choose reference expression data..."
)
} # }
